model.name: Monogram Rainbow Playground Graphic Sweat
model.disambiguatingDescription: This mood-enhancing sweatshirt is a buy now wear now piece whose soft, acidulated colors anticipate spring. Made from cotton jersey, it is embellished with a graphic allover Monogram which has been printed with a slight relief effect.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Green Yellow
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 34’’ / 87 cm, height 6'1.5’’ / 186 cm
  • Made in Italy

model.color: ジョーヌ ヴェール

panelInformations.title: product care
panelInformations.description:
• 30°C very gentle machine wash
  • Wash inside out in a net
  • Iron inside out protecting garment with a fabric in between
panelInformations.introduction: To preserve the quality of this garment, we recommend you to respect the care instructions :
